name: @edgebus/service
title: EdgeBus Service
description: EdgeBus is an application level network edge bus that adds connectivity, auditability, and observability to your apps with no code changes.
author: ZXTeam <pub@zxteam.org> (http://www.zxteam.org)

scripts.clean: find src \( -name '*.js' -o -name '*.d.ts' -o -name '*.map' \) -exec rm {} \; ; find src-devel \( -name '*.js' -o -name '*.d.ts' -o -name '*.map' \) -exec rm {} \; ; find test \( -name '*.js' -o -name '*.d.ts' -o -name '*.map' \) -exec rm {} \;
scripts.build:application: rm -rf lib && tsc --project tsconfig-application.json && cp -a bin .dist/bin && jq '{ name: .name, version: .version, description: .description, author: .author, contributors: .contributors, license: .license, keywords: .keywords, repository: .repository, bugs: .bugs, engines: .engines, homepage: .homepage, main: "lib/index.js", types: "lib/index.d.ts", dependencies: .dependencies, build: .build }' package.json > .dist/package.json
scripts.build:package: rm -rf lib && tsc --project tsconfig-package.json && cp PACKAGE.md .dist/README.md && jq '{ name: .name, version: .version, description: .description, author: .author, contributors: .contributors, license: .license, keywords: .keywords, repository: .repository, bugs: .bugs, engines: .engines, homepage: .homepage, main: "lib/index.js", types: "lib/index.d.ts", dependencies: .dependencies, build: .build }' package.json > .dist/package.json
